name: wurfl/wurfl-api
description: WURFL, the Wireless Universal Resource FiLe, is a Device Description Repository (DDR), i.e. a software component that maps HTTP Request headers to the profile of the HTTP client (Desktop, Mobile Device, Tablet, etc.) that issued the request

suggest.ext-redis: phpredis extension allows to use the Redis storage
suggest.predis/predis: predis library allows to use the Redis storage
